https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAn._instruction: Add all custom annotations which define this custom anatomical entity.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this custom anatomical entity.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Add the related anatomical entity as defined by the UBERON ontology.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.name: relatedUBERONTerm

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Add all relations (qualitative or quantitative) of this custom anatomical entity to other anatomical entities.
